#summary How to perform a release

= Deploying javadocs =

Prereq:
 * Ensure that your subversion configuration is setup with auto-properties for mime types. Instructions [http://svnbook.red-bean.com/en/1.4/svn.advanced.props.html#svn.advanced.props.auto here]

Steps:
 * mvn clean javadoc:javadoc
 * cd target/site/
 * svn rm https://jetlang.googlecode.com/svn/site/ -m "removing previous version of site in prep for update"
 * svn import site https://jetlang.googlecode.com/svn/site/ -m "updating site"
